      double Point3D.angleXY_2PI(Point3D p)
      computes the angleXY between p1 and p2 in RADIANS:

      up:(PI/2) , down (1.5PI) , right(0), left(PI).
      double Point3D.angleXY(Point3D p)
      computes the angleXY between p1 and p2 in RADIANS:

      up:(PI/2) , down (-PI/2) , right(0), left(+- PI).

      computes the angleZ between p1 and p2 in RADIANS

      boolean Point3D.smallerThan3D(Point3D p)
